pageContext.claim: “America's economy is incredible, and its economic recovery is outpacing our peer nations. Last quarter, the European Union's GDP decline was nearly 40 percent worse than the United States. So it's 40 percent worse than the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. GDP contracted 9.5 percent in the second quarter, which was about average for many countries around the globe. On average, GDP of EU states only contracted a little more than 3 percent.
